Articles.Content:
i had many mods installed at first but then i decided to remove some of them, so i uninstalled every single mod and re installed the ones which i wanted.... 

Now, this thing is happening where i cant increase the snap angle or the symmetry count...

i thought that it would have to do something with the editor extension redux, so i removed it...but still i can seem to fix that...

 

these are the only 2 scenarios that appear when i play with  the 'r'..... 'c'.....'x' keys

need a little help....

There's a known bug that crops up with Editor Extensions, where the keybinds for those actions will be lost. EE comes with a button to reset them if needed.

In your case, go into the stock keybind settings and reset them.

6 hours ago, FleshJeb said:

There's a known bug that crops up with Editor Extensions, where the keybinds for those actions will be lost. EE comes with a button to reset them if needed.

In your case, go into the stock keybind settings and reset them.

These keybind settings are in the main settings menu, right?

12 hours ago, The_space_monke said:

These keybind settings are in the main settings menu, right?

Yeah, you have to go out to the main menu to get at them.

Here are the default settings: https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings
